materials.raw_text:
- Boron Carbide (B4C): 1200 grams 
 - Terbium Oxide (Tb2O3): 15 grams 
 - Yttrium Oxide (Y2O3): 15 grams

sourcing.instructions:

 - Terbium Oxide: Available from suppliers of rare earth materials or specialty chemical retailers. 
 - Yttrium Oxide: Obtainable from suppliers of ceramics or advanced materials. 
 - Carbon: Can be sourced from graphite suppliers or as activated carbon from chemical suppliers.
